meta: See collection of all Androidhow to use zxing  in  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: QRCodeDemo
repoList.description: This is an about how to use ZXing in Android. ZXing is an open-source, multi-format 1D/2D barcode image processing library implemented in Java, with ports to other languages

repoList.name: Barcode-Scanner
repoList.description: In this respository, we’ll learn how to create a scanner/reader which is able to read barcodes and QR codes available on the products using an android application by using the Zxing library.
